movie.title: Killing Lincoln
movie.plot: April 14, 1865. One gunshot. One assassin hell-bent on killing a tyrant, as he charged the 16th President of the United States. And in one moment, our nation was forever changed. This is the most dramatic and resonant crime in American historyâ€”the true story of the killing of Abraham Lincoln.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.

events.title: Lincoln is fatally shot while at the theater

movie.title: Lincoln
movie.plot: The revealing story of the 16th US President's tumultuous final months in office. In a nation divided by war and the strong winds of change, Lincoln pursues a course of action designed to end the war, unite the country and abolish slavery. With the moral courage and fierce determination to succeed, his choices during this critical moment will change the fate of generations to come.

events.title: the Titanic is struck by an iceberg

movie.title: A Night to Remember
movie.plot: The sinking of the Titanic is presented in a highly realistic fashion in this tense British drama. The disaster is portrayed largely from the perspective of the ocean liner's second officer, Charles Lightoller. Despite numerous warnings about ice, the ship sails on, with Capt. Edward John Smith keeping it going at a steady clip. When the doomed vessel finally hits an iceberg, the crew and passengers discover that they lack enough lifeboats, and tragedy follows.
movie.awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.

events.title: Perry Smith and Richard Hickock are executed for their crimes

movie.title: In Cold Blood
movie.plot: After a botched robbery results in the brutal murder of a rural family, two drifters elude police, in the end coming to terms with their own mortality and the repercussions of their vile atrocity.
movie.awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 7 nominations.

events.title: Truman Capote attends the executions of Richard Hickock and Perry Smith

movie.title: Infamous
movie.plot: While researching his book In Cold Blood, writer Truman Capote develops a close relationship with convicted murderers Dick Hickock and Perry Smith.

events.title: Truman Capote attends the executions of Richard Hickock and Perry Smith

movie.title: Capote
movie.plot: A biopic of the writer, Truman Capote and his assignment for The New Yorker to write the non-fiction book, 'In Cold Blood'.

movie.title: The Craigslist Killer
movie.plot: Based on a true story. Philip Markoff, a charismatic and popular med student at Boston University, leads a double life as a brutal and cruel sexual deviant who abuses prostitutes he finds via Craigslist.
